participant_1.background:
I have a bad habit of being dishonest.
I do whatever it takes to get what i want.
I sometimes get into fights.
I have driven a race car before.
I would like to try sky diving.

participant_2.background:
I am an angry person.
I like to go to bars and people watch.
I drive a jag.
I am an old man.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to bars and people watch.
I like to do that too! What kind of bars do you like to go to?
I like to go to the dive bars. They're more fun and there's a better chance of meeting someone interesting.
I agree! I love the atmosphere in dive bars.
Me too! It's just a more relaxed and fun environment.
Do you ever get into fights at the bars?
I have a few times, but not very often. I'm not a violent person, but I'm not afraid to stand up for myself if I have to.
That's good to hear. I've never been in a fight, but I'm not sure how I would react if I was.
You never know until you're in the situation. But it's always good to be prepared.
I agree. So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to go hiking, camping, and fishing. I also like to play sports, like basketball and baseball.
I like to do all of those things too! I love the outdoors.
Me too! It's the best way to relax and have fun.
So, what do you do for work?
I'm a retired construction worker. I used to drive a big rig, but I had to retire early due to health problems.
I'm sorry to hear that. But I'm sure you're enjoying your retirement.
I am! I love spending time with my grandkids and going fishing.
That sounds great! I'm happy for you.
